'''"Fragments of Innocence"''' is a special refinement material for the event-exclusive weapon [[Dodoco Tales]].

==Trivia==
The Teyvat script shown on the page's icon spells:
<pre>
EYBETRAYYOUYO
UMAYJUST
BLOWTHEMUPAND
THEREFORET
HEBESTFRIENDTH
ATWILLNEVERTUR
NTHEI
RBACKONYOUIS▊
MB
</pre>

Which if properly arranged results in, "[Th]ey betray you, you may just blow them up. And therefore, the best friend that will never turn their back on you is. . ."
